title: Debug a test case in Katalon Studio
description: Creating automation test cases is a repetitive task that   requires a lot of editing and re-running test cases. In many   automation tools, when a test case fails and you make certain   changes to the script, you usually have to execute the whole script   all over again to make sure the test is executed as expected.

frontMatter.title: Debug a test case in Katalon Studio
